TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionService extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 建立管理组件的 对象集合的设计时服务。

span.span: Establishes a design-time service that manages the collection of objects for components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类负责管理集合的在设计时在窗体存在的组件的每个实例的对象。The class is responsible for managing the collection of objects for each instance of a component that exists on a form at design time. 此类可让直推模型项创建过程中，主要是供使用的设计时工具开发人员，但它还可以使用的组件和自定义控件开发人员。This class enables a direct push model of item creation, and is primarily intended for use by design-time tool developers, although it can also be used by component and custom control developers. 设计时工具开发人员将需要确定要显示的一个组件，并确定何时更改此列表的项列表。Design-time tool developers will need to determine the list of items to display for a component and determine when this list changes. 他们还可能与智能标记面板对象结合使用来创建操作的外接程序。They may also create add-ins that operate in conjunction with smart tag panel objects. 高级开发人员可能需要动态控制与某个组件关联的项从而替换或补充标准拉模型的组件。Advanced component developers may need to dynamically control the items associated with a component, thus replacing or supplementing the standard pull model. 例如，可以根据其使用情况和组件的设计时状态的上下文更改面板的命令。For example, panel commands can be altered depending on the context of their use and the design-time state of the component. > [!NOTE] > 实际上是驾驶服务背后的推送和拉取模型; 但是，在后一种情况下它隐式运行。The is actually the driving service behind both the push and pull models; however, in the latter case it operates implicitly. 用于访问和处理每个组件，包括以下方法和事件的项提供了一个简单的界面： provides a straightforward interface for accessing and manipulating the items for each component, including the following methods and events: - 方法确定是否当前正在管理的特定组件。The method determines whether the is currently managing a particular component. - 方法支持的项列表的枚举。The method supports the enumeration of the lists of items. - 方法，添加或到的组件实例的现有项集。The method allows adding a or to the set of existing items for a component instance. 与此相反，方法中删除一个或所有的项列表中与某个组件关联。In contrast, the method removes one or all of the item lists associated with a component. > [!NOTE] > 方法表示将控制面板项与组件相关联的直推模型。The method represents the direct push model of associating panel items with a component. 拉取模型与此相反，重写依赖于该组件的设计器类的属性。In contrast, the pull model relies on overriding the property of the designer class for that component. 在设计环境负责将这些项添加到当前设计图面上创建一个组件时。The design environment is responsible for adding these items into the current when a component is created on the design surface. > [!IMPORTANT] > ， ， ，和方法只考虑或影响推送模型项。The , , , and methods only consider or affect push-model items. - 事件指示组件的更改的项的集合。The event indicates when the collection of items changes for a component. 因为它通常需要使用某些组件的设计时快捷菜单和其面板中相同的控制面板项，很大程度的互操作性之间存在对象和设计器谓词。Because it is often desirable to use some of the same panel items in both the component's design-time shortcut menu and its panel, a large degree of interoperability exists between objects and designer verbs. 如果组件设计器未显式指定(即，它不包含被重写属性)，则列表将创建从现有设计器谓词。If a component designer does not explicitly specify a (that is, it does not contain an overridden property), then a list will be created from existing designer verbs. 这些谓词所指定的属性。These verbs are specified by the property. 在这种情况下，内部谓词列表类用于包含谓词项面板项的集合。In this case, an internal verb list class is used to contain the collection of verb item panel entries. 如果你想要使用同时作为面板条目和设计时快捷方式菜单条目，则可以设置`includeAsDesignerVerb`中项的构造函数的参数。If you want a to be used both as a panel entry and a design-time shortcut menu entry, then you can set the `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter in the item's constructor. 使用来控制您的设计器显示。Use the to control the display of your designer's .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 当前设计时环境的服务提供程序。

span.span: The service provider for the current design-time environment.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务提供程序进行监视所选内容和组件更改所需。A service provider is necessary for monitoring selection and component changes. 它应该支持和类型。It is expected to support the and types. 类使用内部表来管理组件和及其相关智能标记。The class uses an internal table to manage components and their associated smart tags. 通常情况下，组件开发人员将不需要创建此类; 的实例相反，它们能够获取现有实例通过调用方法。Typically, component developers will not need to create an instance of this class; instead, they can acquire an existing instance through a call to the method.

summary.span: 将一个或多个 对象添加到当前的托管智能标记集合。

span.span: Adds one or more objects to the current collection of managed smart tags.

Public Sub Add (comp As IComponent, actionList As DesignerActionList)

span.span: The to associate the smart tags with.

param.name: actionList

span.span: The that contains the new smart tag items to be added.

summary.span: 将 添加到当前的托管智能标记集合。

span.span: Adds a to the current collection of managed smart tags.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法表示添加智能标记项的推送模型。The method represents the push model of adding smart tag items. 备用拉模型依赖于重写相应组件的设计器中的属性。The alternate pull model relies on overriding the property in the designer for the corresponding component. 调用此方法时，扫描要添加的列表中是否有任何与属性设置为`true`。When this method is called, the lists to be added are scanned for any with the property set to `true`. 这些项添加到此组件，通过调用的设计器谓词的列表方法。These items are added to the list of designer verbs for this component, through a call to the method. 组件实例的基础上进行管理的智能标记。Smart tags are managed on a component instance basis. 托管的集合可能包含重复项。The managed collection may contain duplicate entries. 此方法将引发事件。This method raises the event.

exception.span: 两个参数之一或两个参数均为 。

summary.span: 将 添加到当前的托管智能标记集合。

span.span: Adds a to the current collection of managed smart tags.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法表示添加智能标记项的推送模型。The method represents the push model of adding smart tag items. 备用拉模型依赖于重写相应组件的设计器中的属性。The alternate pull model relies on overriding the property in the designer for the corresponding component. 调用此方法时，扫描要添加的列表中是否有任何与属性设置为`true`。When this method is called, the lists to be added are scanned for any with the property set to `true`. 这些项添加到此组件，通过调用的设计器谓词的列表方法。These items are added to the list of designer verbs for this component, through a call to the method. 组件实例的基础上进行管理的智能标记。Smart tags are managed on a component instance basis. 托管的集合可能包含重复项。The managed collection may contain duplicate entries. 此方法将引发事件。This method raises the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 解除所有组件的管理，并清除所有推模型智能标记列表。

span.span: Releases all components from management and clears all push-model smart tag lists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可清空内部表用于存储有关组件和其推模型智能标记列表的信息。The method empties the internal table used to store information about components and their push-model smart tag lists. > [!CAUTION] > 由于此方法会影响由当前服务管理的所有组件，而不仅仅是当前的组件，因此应谨慎使用此方法。Because this method affects all components managed by the current service, and not just the current component, this method should be used judiciously. 通常情况下，设计时工具开发人员使用它重置设计图面上时。Typically, the design-time tool developer uses it when resetting a design surface. 组件开发人员应使用其中一个方法改为删除单个智能标记项或列出。Component developers should use one of the methods instead to remove individual smart tag items or lists. 一个每个组件的以前已由当前服务引发事件。A event is raised for each component that was previously managed by the current service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent comp) cil managed
Public Function Contains (comp As IComponent) As Boolean

returns.span: 如果组件由当前服务管理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the component is managed by the current service; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法仅识别推模型智能标记，将关联到具有组件方法。The method only recognizes push-model smart tags, which are associated to a component with the method. 尽管没有任何结构可在任意数量的并发设计时工具创建的实例，通常只能运行一个服务实例是每个创建设计图面。Although there is no structural limitation on the number of concurrent instances created by a design-time tool, typically only a single instance of the service is created per design surface.

summary.span: 为任何组件移除或添加 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a is removed or added for any component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了一组与关联的专用类事件。The following table shows the set of specialized classes associated with the event. |专用的类型Specialized type|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||将特定的信息添加到智能标记列表管理。Adds information specific to smart tag list management. 此类从专用。This class is specialized from .| ||连接与其处理程序。Connects the with its handler.| ||表示是否已添加或删除列表。Denotes whether a list has been added or removed.| 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是通过委托的唯一方法的实现接口。The method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the interface. 使用完 后调用此方法。Call this method when you are finished using the . 它将执行两个主要操作：It performs two main actions: - 通过调用在设计环境中的可用服务列表中移除当前服务方法。Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the method. - 从关联到组件更改事件取消订阅接口。Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated interface. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是通过委托的唯一方法的实现接口。The method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the interface. 使用完 后调用此方法。Call this method when you are finished using the . 它将执行两个主要操作：It performs two main actions: - 通过调用在设计环境中的可用服务列表中移除当前服务方法。Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the method. - 从关联到组件更改事件取消订阅接口。Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated interface. 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。详细了解如何实现，请参阅 [实现 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息并，请参阅 [清理了非托管 Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

returns.span: 指定组件的智能标记集合。

span.span: The collection of smart tags for the specified component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法等效于调用方法使用`type`参数的。The method is equivalent to a call to the method using a `type` parameter of . 因此，返回的集合将包含智能标记的推送和拉取列表。Therefore, the collection returned will contain both the push and pull lists of smart tags. 返回是通过添加的项列表的联合方法和还列出了来自从组件的站点获取的实例。The returned is the union of item lists added through the methods and also the lists obtained from the instance obtained from the component’s site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的重载方法筛选`type`参数，它可以具有以下值之一。This version of the overloaded method filters on the `type` parameter, which can have one of the following values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||所有关联的智能标记。All associated smart tags.| ||仅拉模型智能标记。Pull-model smart tags only.| ||仅推模型智能标记。Push-model smart tags only.| 如果一个组件的关联设计器不提供拉模型智能标记列表，则方法将改为使用设计器的设计时快捷菜单项从属性。If the associated designer for a component does not supply a pull-model smart tag list, then the method will instead use the designer's design-time shortcut menu items from the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的的设计工具开发人员通常使用方法，因为组件开发人员通常不知道哪些其他组件存在于当前的设计空间。This version of the method is typically used by design tool developers, because component developers typically do not know what other components exist in the current design space. 如果成功，此方法将引发事件。If successful, this method raises the event.
